website_summaries.verdict: A freeze-dried meal with a bit of a spicy kick. Buyers should note there are only two servings in each pouch.
pros: Tasty with a hint of southwestern spice and 13 grams of protein
Makes a hearty and delicious meal while camping or backpacking
cons: It's pricier than a lot of other choices, but you'll feel like you're eating gourmet
Hot water is needed to prepare the food, which may be impossible in some situations

customer_reviews.title: Plenty tasty, and it's the right amount of spice for a weekend in the woods away from a toilet.
customer_reviews.text: Make no mistake, the final product will look nothing like the included image, but it's plenty tasty, and it's the right amount of spice for a weekend in the woods away from a toilet. Dropped the water by about 1/4 cup from the recommended amount. Not soupy at all on the first try (as some of them can be until you get the balance right). Texture, taste, and heartiness were solid. Spice was present, but not strong. This and the biscuits and gravy are now my go to for hot breakfasts on the trail!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Grzymkowski

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to prepare with little clean up. You just add a little boiling water and stir a couple times then it's breakfast time. The potatoes didn't seem like they were cooked completely and the flavor was a little watery. This was the only meal by them that I didn't love especially being one of the most expensive ones. I didn't find it spicy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Shipman

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a disappointment with MH and I think I've tried nearly all the dinner and breakfast varieties. The breakfast hash was no exception --goid taste and texture. Just follow the directions. The pouches are not expensive if you're dividing it between 2 people. I usually supplement with a snack and I'm satisfied. I use these for camping but it's good to have some extra MH in the pantry, just in case of an emergency
customer_reviews.author: Capt Bob

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and filling
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic breakfast, and definitely enough for two people, unless you are an extreme eater. I can eat a lot, and this was more than enough for my son and I. Add a tortilla, and you are really good. I would consider maybe adding a splash of Tabasco, but totally optional
customer_reviews.author: docfeelgood

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite of the Mountain House collection of breakfasts. It boasts very good flavor, a good variety of ingredients, and the beef actually looks, feels and tastes like beef. It's not killer spicy, if that's what you're after, but with a dose of hot sauce you can create a 5-alarm inferno. It's a satisfying way to start a camping day.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Mckenna

customer_reviews.title: Best backpacking breakfast yet
customer_reviews.text: Best backpacking breakfast I’ve found yet. The shredded hash browns are great rehydrated. It’s a bit spicy but overall tasty af.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Utts

customer_reviews.title: Breakfast Burritos
customer_reviews.text: My wife doesn't like eggs. This is perfect for breakfast burritos as they don't have any eggs in them. We love it. Happy wife happy life
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R.

customer_reviews.title: Loved every Mountain House that I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.text: I empty the bag and vacuum seal it in ziplock for better storage. I put directions on the bag and keep one Mountain House bag to cook all my other Mountain House meals.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: One of the best freeze dried breakfasts  I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: This meal was awesome for breakfast. I wish I’d taken more. The other two guys I shared with so I only got two days awesome breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Satisfying meal. Great taste. More beef and less hash (taste) than expected, but still great.
customer_reviews.author: Nic MacSweeney

customer_reviews.title: favorite camping breakfast
customer_reviews.text: best breakfast. a little spicy and need to give it an extra minute or two to get the potatoes soft
customer_reviews.author: CKF

customer_reviews.title: Better then much of the food I make myself
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. This was my first freeze dried MH meal so I didn't know what to expect. The taste was well above my expectations. Plenty of meat as well. So spicy and yummy!! Can't wait to try more
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T Gorczyca

customer_reviews.title: Good ol Deliciousness
customer_reviews.text: Taste like home, Just like what Grandma use to make.
customer_reviews.author: BIG LARRY

customer_reviews.title: Love the favor and convenience.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Repeat purchaser. Good for office and camping.
customer_reviews.author: Issac

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This one wasn't worth the extra cost. Not as good as the regular breakfast hash
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: One of my new favorites
customer_reviews.text: I am a regular hiker and backpacker and I have to say I was very surprised by the taste and texture and it is one of my new favorites.
customer_reviews.author: mad max

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Never trust the water specified. Get a feel for it at home if your new to mountain house. Always use less unless you want soup.
customer_reviews.author: FCguy

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty!
customer_reviews.text: It has a bite to it that I really enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: ocktomas

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. Make me can’t wait for an emergency. Lol. Picture is deceiving. But all in all we will eat when need be.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L Pruett

customer_reviews.title: For on the trail or emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good and has all the important nutrients to keep you going strong while backpacking. Lightest food source you can pack.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Green

customer_reviews.title: I love it one of my favorite breackfest
customer_reviews.text: I love it one of my favorite breackfest. It got me hooked on freeze dry food. Do wish it was spicier.
customer_reviews.author: TAJB

customer_reviews.title: Rehydrated easily. Good flavor
customer_reviews.text: Freeze drying tech has come a long way since I first tried mountain house meals (10+ years ago). Rehydrated easily. Good flavor. Moderate spice.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, but not as hot and spicy as I thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: Richard W

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Very delicious product. I have this for breakfast sometimes with an over easy egg. Will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: you won’t go hungry
customer_reviews.text: the large portions are always appreciated, Mountain House packets for backpacking are the best - bring a little salt / pepper and some packets of hot sauce and your stylin
customer_reviews.author: Don Whetstine

customer_reviews.title: Great southwest taste
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor plenty to eat mix boiling water wait and enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Timothy C. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting breakfast or lunch or dinner !!
customer_reviews.text: Best of all the mountain house breakfasts they sell.We could eat this several times a week. .
customer_reviews.author: acerking

customer_reviews.title: took 2 of these on a backpacking trip for a ...
customer_reviews.text: took 2 of these on a backpacking trip for a long weekend. Tasty as can be to start the morning with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a trip believing the glowing reviews and expecting a great treat. The first bite was promising. Then everything after was a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Radford

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delicious, fantastic breakfast when camping. I definitely like the flavor and a healthy serving as well
customer_reviews.author: Randy

product_meta.title: Mountain House Spicy Southwest Style Skillet | Freeze Dried Backpacking & Camping Food | Gluten-Free
